---
title: "Import data from Github and explore it"
output: html_notebook
---

***Bring library for importing URL***
```{r}
library(RCurl)
```


***Create the dataframe***
```{r}
x <- getURL("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SebRey1995/R-vs-Python/main/data/temixco.csv?token=GHSAT0AAAAAABQL7OXNTXMQAMJKMO3B7FUWYO3TJ2A")

data_temixco <- read.csv(text = x)
data_temixco
```


***Summary of the data***
```{r}
summary(data_temixco)
```
